snippet: This week's cover photograph by Joel van Houdt shows a number of the people who appear in Luke Mogelson's story at Outpost Shrine, Kajaki, Helmand Province.
abstract: This week's cover photograph by Joel van Houdt shows a number of the people who appear in Luke Mogelson's story at Outpost Shrine, Kajaki, Helmand Province.

headline.main: The Key to the Soldiers on the Cover
